column1: Depends on Journal Form : ManEd Form

column3: Go to Journal Search page at /editor/group_journals
Click "Edit this journal" link at the bottom of any journal - note the title of the edited journal for future reference

column4: Page /editor/journal/<id> is open in a new browser window/tab (<id> is id of the chosen journal)
Editor Group drop down in Editorial area is disabled and show your group's name

column3: Click on the "Assigned to" drop down in Editorial area

column4: All editors from your group are available to choose

column3: Choose any editor from "Assigned to" drop down by clicking on his name

column4: Now chosen editor's name is displayed in "Assigned" to field

Besides "Editorial" only "Basic Journal Information", "Subject classification", "Quality and Transparency of the Editoria Process", "How Open is the Journal", "Contact licensing", "Copyright and Permissions" and "Notes" areas are displayed to edit
Note that you cannot change the Editor Group but can assign the journal to different Editor

column3: Edit value of one of the fields

column4: Message banner "Journal updated." is shown at the top of the page

column3: Click Dismiss at the right of the banner
Click "Unlock and Close" button at the top of the application

column4:
You see the message: This record is now unlocked
You may close this tab safely.
Confirm appropriate data was changed either on search result (you may need to refresh the page to see them applied) or on Journals page at /toc/<id>
